summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-fifth Avenue Northeast, from East 54th Street to P. Ry Co's right of way in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 15795, creating Local Improvement District No. 1474 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
